extendedInfo.description: Memory Kids is a FUN, ENTERTAINING and EDUCATIONAL game that will exercise your memory. It will help you and your kids improve brain power, especially memory skills, concentration and recognition. This pair matching game includes five sets of numerous beautiful pairs including farm animals, toys, sweets, sea animals, birds, pirates, dinosaurs, letters, numbers etc. Being a multiplayer game (for up to 4 players), Memory Kids can entertain the whole family. Who will win? The kids or the parents? Try it out and have great fun. There is only one simple rule: match as many pairs as you can. The one who collects most pairs wins the game. In a single player mode you also have a timer to compare your result with others or to improve your best time.Game is appropriate for children of all ages: babies, toddlers, preschoolers, school children, pre-teens and even teenagers. Both, boys and girls, will enjoy playing this memory game. However, adults can also have some great fun with it.Features:â Improve brain power, memory skills, concentration and recognitionâ Great game to exercise your memoryâ 5 difficulty levelsâ 5 themes (playground, farm animals, dinosaurs, sea life, letters, numbers)â Improve children learning curve with the recognition of digits and lettersâ Single and multiplayer mode - up to 4 playersâ Beautiful high quality HD graphicsâ Intuitive, easy to use interface â Fun for the whole family - kids and adultsâ Designed as an educational tool for small childrenâ Designed for phones and tablets
